name: It's Not Lupus!
description:
It's Not Lupus!

It's Not Lupus! is a game made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 41 by cMonkeys (Roidz, Durgan, and Deozaan).

The theme for LD41 was "Combine Two Incompatible Genres" so we chose to combine trivia and arcade.

How to Play

The trivia section of the game requires mouse (or touch) input.
The arcade section of the game can be played with a keyboard (or gamepad):

Move: A and D or Arrow Keys
Shoot: Spacebar

Destroy the large "virus" in the center to win the arcade mode.
